===Etymology===
A contraction of the earlier {{term|錦官城||[[city|City]] of the [[brocade|Brocade]] [[official|Official]]|tr=Jinguanchéng|lang=zh}}, from a Han-era office instituted to oversee the quality and supply of the city's then-popular brocade.
